structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
Bonds Of Executors, Administrators, Guardians, Conservators, Trustees And Receivers

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 37. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] A guardian or trustee not required to give bond by the laws in force at the time of his appointment shall not be required to give bond under the preceding sections of this chapter, except by special order of the court under section five.
